接口的使用
org.springframework.web.client.AsyncRequestCallback

  • 使用AsyncRequestCallback的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.client
    Core package of the client-side web support.

    • org.springframework.web.client中AsyncRequestCallback的使用

      返回AsyncRequestCallback的org.springframework.web.client中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected <T> AsyncRequestCallback AsyncRestTemplate.acceptHeaderRequestCallback(java.lang.Class<T> responseType)
      已过时。 
      Returns a request callback implementation that prepares the request Accept headers based on the given response type and configured message converters.
      protected <T> AsyncRequestCallback AsyncRestTemplate.httpEntityCallback(HttpEntity<T> requestBody)
      已过时。 
      Returns a request callback implementation that writes the given object to the request stream.
      protected <T> AsyncRequestCallback AsyncRestTemplate.httpEntityCallback(HttpEntity<T> request, java.lang.reflect.Type responseType)
      已过时。 
      Returns a request callback implementation that writes the given object to the request stream.

      已过时。 
      Execute the given method on the provided URI.

      已过时。 
      Asynchronously execute the HTTP method to the given URI template, preparing the request with the AsyncRequestCallback, and reading the response with a ResponseExtractor.
